channel.title: Bring me the horizon & whitechapel
channel.description:
i fucking orgasm to this shit.
[b]BMTH[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NyxF1YD5EMQ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AWggPLXeOkU http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Og4fCRNuaA http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P0XaOJjcKDg
[b]Whitechapel[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2eOuMJjXdCk http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JKNxF6B5Qic http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wn9NtLSuXPs
I'll fucking steal the diamonds from your eyes and seal those lips below your waste.

item.title: Bring me the horizon & whitechapel
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“magma”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=299453.msg2406535#msg2406535 date=1219743724]
I hate core bands, people in my school say there metal, they really DONT know what metal is if they think this shit is metal…
[/quote]
Who cares about who listens to be what to be who? This argument is like the one about “anti-mainstream” people. You can go into detail about how people listen to certain types of music to show off how detached they are from the rest of the world, but the truth is that they listen to it because it’s good. Well that doesn’t make sense… but whatever :D[/quote]
it just sucks, end of story

Read full topic

item.title: Bring me the horizon & whitechapel
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Speljohan:

Hell, just to prove you wrong i’m going to download the tabs for them both after school and show you they play the same over and over again.

Over and over?
Okay lol.

And then I’ll get you the tab for every other band with a verse in their song and show you it’s played again.

Read full topic

item.title: Bring me the horizon & whitechapel
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:43, topic:227845”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=299453.msg2424481#msg2424481 date=1220531426]

[quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=299453.msg2424459#msg2424459 date=1220526128]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=299453.msg2423412#msg2423412 date=1220467069]

[quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=299453.msg2422958#msg2422958 date=1220447076]

The great thing about everyone who complains about this music is about the vocals.

We don’t even LISTEN to the vocals. Unless they do something really different with them, it’s all about the other parts.
[/quote]I don’t dislike it for the vocals, i dislike it because all the bands/songs sound the same. They never improve musically, just stay on the same level all the time. I can’t believe it evolved into a genre.

Did you even LISTEN to the two songs I named?

Name another band with a song that sounds like those.
[/quote]I listened to both. The only difference from other metalcore bands was the uncreative guitar-shreds throughout the songs, semi-decent arpeggios, but it got really repetitive.

And how are they uncreative?
[/quote]They play the exact same guitar thing over and over again?

LOLLLLL
[/quote]You can’t deny it

No the funny things is I specifically listened to them last night and today to see what you were talking about…

And other than verses repeating themselves (keep in mind most of the verses in songs repeat themselves, and if not the lyrics, than the beat) there is no repetition of anything in the song.[/quote]Hell, just to prove you wrong i’m going to download the tabs for them both after school and show you they play the same over and over again.

Read full topic

The great thing about everyone who complains about this music is about the vocals.

We don’t even LISTEN to the vocals. Unless they do something really different with them, it’s all about the other parts.
[/quote]I don’t dislike it for the vocals, i dislike it because all the bands/songs sound the same. They never improve musically, just stay on the same level all the time. I can’t believe it evolved into a genre.

Did you even LISTEN to the two songs I named?

Name another band with a song that sounds like those.
[/quote]I listened to both. The only difference from other metalcore bands was the uncreative guitar-shreds throughout the songs, semi-decent arpeggios, but it got really repetitive.

And how are they uncreative?
[/quote]They play the exact same guitar thing over and over again?

LOLLLLL
[/quote]You can’t deny it ;)[/quote]

No the funny things is I specifically listened to them last night and today to see what you were talking about…

And other than verses repeating themselves (keep in mind most of the verses in songs repeat themselves, and if not the lyrics, than the beat) there is no repetition of anything in the song.
